Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='LRCM03')

BibliographicData.Title: Prefrontal and agranular cingulate projections to the dorsal premotor areas F2 and F7 in the macaque monkey.

BrainSite.FullName: F2 sector located around the superior precentral dimple
supplementary eye field part of Area F7 (dorsorostral)

Reference.Quotation: "Three tracer injections were placed in F2d. Two of them were placed the more dorsal part of the arm field of F2, involving the lateral bank of the superior precentral dimple (Case 12) or close to it (Case 10FB)." In a third case (Case10 TB), an injection of TB was placed dorsal to the superior precentral dimple."
"A few marked cells were observed in trhe dorsal part of area 46,.."

"Two monkeys (Case 11 FB and Case 18) received tracer injections in F2vr."
"A very restricted, but relatively dense, labelling was observed in DLPFd."
"A very restricted, but relatively dense, labelling was observed in DLPFd."

Reference.Comments: The quantitative data is presented as a summation for labeled neurons in areas 24a and 24b. Therfore this information is entered twice for both areas.

"Two cases had tracer injections placed in F7-non SEF. In Case 13, the FB injection site was placed in the caudal part of F7, on the cortical convexity, whereas in Case 11 the DY injection involved the shoulder and posterior bank of the superior branch of the arcurate sulcus."
"As following injections in F7-non SEF a rich labeling was observed in the prefrontal cortex."
"As following injections in F7-non SEF a rich labeling was observed in the prefrontal cortex."
"As following injections in F7-non SEF a rich labeling was observed in the prefrontal cortex."

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin

Reference.Quotation: "Two animals ( Cases 1A and 2) received tracer injections localized to F7-SEF."
"As in Case 2, labelling was observed in prefrontal areas 12, 8B, 46, and in cingulate areas 24c and in areas 24a and 24b."
